org.nzdis.micro

Interface Agent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAgent, AnonymousAgent, HeartbeatAgent, SystemOwner

    public interface Agent
    This interface describes the contract for agent implementations on the OPAL micro-agent framework. Created: 26/06/2010
    Version:
    $Revision: 2.0 $ $Date: 2011/06/15 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Mariusz Nowostawski (Original author), Christopher Frantz (Revision author)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentController addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
      Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group.
      AgentController addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter, java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
      Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group.
      void addRole(Role role)
      Adds a role instance to the agent and registers its role's intents.
      void clearMessageFilters()
      Removes all sub-agents acting as message filters registered in this agent's group.
      void die()
      Kills the agent.
      void disposeRole(Role role)
      Disposes role from this agent.
      java.lang.String getAgentName()
      Returns agent's name.
      java.lang.Class[] getApplicableIntents()
      Returns all intents applicable for this agent.
      Group getGroup()
      Returns this agent's group.
      Role[] getMessageFilters()
      Returns all message filters registered for this agent (as sub-agents in its group).
      Agent getOwner()
      Returns this agent's owner.
      Group getOwnerGroup()
      Returns this agent's owner's group.
      Role getRole(java.lang.String roleName)
      Returns the role instance played by this agent for a given role name.
      Role[] getRoles()
      Returns all roles played by this agent.
      Role[] getRoles(java.lang.Class aRoleType)
      Returns all roles of a given role type played by this agent.
      int getStatus()
      Returns agent status (see AgentStates for details)
      boolean hasGroup()
      Indicates if agent owns a group (and potentially sub-agents).
      boolean hasMessageFilter()
      Indicates if agent has message filters (in its group).
      boolean isMessageFilter()
      Indicates if agent plays a message filter role itself.
      void killSubHierarchyUponDeath(boolean strategy)
      configures the sub-agent handling strategy upon death of agent (true --> kill sub-agents on death false --> reassign sub-agents to owner agent upon death)
      boolean playsRole(Role role)
      Indicates if agent plays passed role instance.
      void removeMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
      Removes message filter of this agent (i.e.
      void removeMessageFilter(java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
      Removes message filter of this agent, identified by sub-agent's name.
      boolean resume()
      Resumes the agent's execution.
      boolean suspend()
      Suspends the agent from execution.

        void killSubHierarchyUponDeath(boolean strategy)
        configures the sub-agent handling strategy upon death of agent (true --> kill sub-agents on death false --> reassign sub-agents to owner agent upon death)
        Parameters:
        strategy - (boolean with values above)

      • addRole

        void addRole(Role role)
        Adds a role instance to the agent and registers its role's intents. If message transport support is not enabled and the role to be played is a social role it will be enabled.
        Parameters:
        role - Role to be initialized on agent.

      • disposeRole

        void disposeRole(Role role)
        Disposes role from this agent.
        Parameters:

      • hasMessageFilter

        boolean hasMessageFilter()
        Indicates if agent has message filters (in its group). The agent does not need to be message filter itself.
        Returns:

      • isMessageFilter

        boolean isMessageFilter()
        Indicates if agent plays a message filter role itself.
        Returns:

      • addMessageFilter

        AgentController addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter,
                                 java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
        Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group.
        Parameters:
        filter - Message filter instance
        messageFilterAgentName - Name for the sub-agent playing the message filter
        Returns:

      • addMessageFilter

        AgentController addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
        Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group. Automatically assigns agent name.
        Parameters:
        filter - Message filter instance
        Returns:

      • getMessageFilters

        Role[] getMessageFilters()
        Returns all message filters registered for this agent (as sub-agents in its group).
        Returns:

      • removeMessageFilter

        void removeMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
        Removes message filter of this agent (i.e. this agent's sub-agent playing the role).
        Parameters:
        filter - Message filter instance

      • removeMessageFilter

        void removeMessageFilter(java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
        Removes message filter of this agent, identified by sub-agent's name.
        Parameters:
        messageFilterAgentName - Name of sub-agent playing message filter role

      • clearMessageFilters

        void clearMessageFilters()
        Removes all sub-agents acting as message filters registered in this agent's group.
